phrases: No one here is running half-assed!
If you are only able to achieve the same time at the next meet,
That kind of talk is ineffective.
It is true that he went too far, though.
He also said that because he is taking running at Hakone seriously.
Prince, you do not need to worry about it,
and I do not want the two of you to have any weird biases.
We know he is not a bad guy.
But he can be really irritable.
I was so upset, I was up all night reading.
Someone besides Kakeru is not eating.
I wonder how it will actually go.
Do you think I can achieve the required official record?
Running next to you makes me feel like I can reconsider what it means to run.
Right foot forward, left foot forward.
but before you know it, it looks like you are running.
I am re-experiencing the excitement of running.
I do not think I understand.
But I think I understand what it means to do something together.
We read the same comics together at the same time.
We count down to start reading.
There is a moment our waves become synchronized.
We start turning the page simultaneously.
The temperature in our rooms definitely increases by oneno, two degrees.
Even if we do not share our thoughts,
it feels like we have thoroughly discussed the content.
I do not think I understand.
Did not he say that to Prince?
He asked Prince to quit the team.
He cannot suddenly achieve an official record.
What did Haiji have to say about it?
Do not have any weird biases.
You do not have to do anything to get hungry, huh?
You tried to hide in the last place I would look for you.
It got a little cold during the time it took to find you.
It does not look good for a grown-ass man to accept a lunch from another grown-ass man!
Do not worry about how it looks.
That is not what I meant!
I could tell not enough rice was missing.
When I checked, I found exactly one serving had not been eaten.
I consider the volume and nutrition everyone needs when preparing meals everyday.
Since I started cooking all our meals.
You do not have to push yourself so hard.
You will probably get it eventually.
You will not say I definitely will, huh?
Eating this will change my point of view.
At least take your mind off it with this.
Yuki's time has improved a ton.
It is only been three weeks,
but because you all stuck to the training schedule,
we are starting to see results.
Tomorrow's track meet will be a good opportunity for a second chance.
Right now, we are working hard to get into the Hakone Ekiden.
Without even one of us, we cannot get there.
We do not have any substitutes.
Let us all attend tomorrow's track meet, so we can all participate together.
I will now announce the members who will be participating in tomorrow's track meet.
Running in tomorrow's track meet will be Musa,
The remaining members will be going to the meet, as well.

What is that strong team called?
I did not notice at the Tokyo Sport track meet,
When a bunch of guys wearing the same color uniform are grouped up together,
it makes them look really strong.
And Rikudo's pure white uniforms enhance the effect.
It is like they are telling everyone how strong they are.
When we are not wearing our uniforms, you cannot tell who we are.
It will not be as hot as the weather report said.

please gather at the starting line.

please gather at the starting line.
It is our second time, but I am still nervous.
It is because it is our second time.
Practice should be just as hard.
Will we ever get used to this?
Then I will create space in front of you.
Pass me if you think you have got it.
This kind of feels like a game.
We used to swap positions all the time.
Our opponents could not tell us apart.
Then what have I been training for?
You already got your official record.
That is not what this is about!
You should understand better than anyone
how it feels not to be able to run when you want to!
I know you want to run more than anything.
And that you do not see what running is about.
Be like Prince and Nico-chan Senpai.
I do not think I have narrowly escaped.
If anything, you could say I have got no way out now.
I heard you said something to Prince.
It was the heat of the moment.
I am taking this seriously in my own way.
You finally said what is really on your mind.
I cannot believe I am watching a track meet.
I would not have imagined this a month ago.
Watching them from here makes you realize how fast they are.
To achieve an official record, your pace for each lap needs to be...
Last time, running took so much of my energy
that I could not afford to worry about my time.
They are starting to spread out.
Musa, this is the moment of truth!
Calm down and hold that pace!
How many seconds per lap did you say?
Hey, you were smug when you immediately answered earlier!
It is your fault for not remembering!
I thought you were going to make it.
Was not that your best time, Yuki?
You did not achieve an official result, but it was not bad, at all.
When I think about how I have to run again,
it makes me want to puke.
I waited too long during the middle.
I realized I am not someone who can win a sprint.
You sound like a long-distance runner.
We could not hear what you were saying, but we saw you.
Just as we were thinking, Stop!
Just thinking that these two were saying something to me
You were saying something, were not you?
He can see Aotake from the top of the Skytree.
He was calling everyone is names.
I was so embarrassed to be standing next to him.
I did not know what to do.
He is a good guy at heart, too.
Everyone who ran and everyone who cheered, you guys did a great job.
Because of your efforts, everyone is times improved considerably.
This is a huge step forward.
We have got our own way of doing things.
We will have plenty more chances.
Well, it is not my style to end on a loss.
I wish I could have been a spectator this time.
Did you see anyone running half-assed?
Everyone was going as hard as they could.
I understand what you are trying to say.
When they failed to achieve official records,
I was as disappointed as if it were me.
I felt for the first time the earnestness of the people cheering around me.
That is why I understand what you are trying to say.
But I still do not think we can do it.
